message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which is valued at $8000. Considering its exceptional quality and value, I'm proposing an initial price of $7500. I believe this offers a fair deal for both of us.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the value of your product. I am willing to pay $7300 for it.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I understand your position and appreciate your willingness to meet my asking price. However, considering the unique features and high quality of the product, I believe we can reach a more mutually beneficial agreement. My revised offer would be $7600 for the product. I hope this proposal aligns better with your budget while still reflecting the true value of the item.
I appreciate your efforts to find a middle ground, Alice. After careful consideration, I am willing to pay $7450 for the product.

Thank you for your latest offer, Bob. I've considered your proposal carefully, and I believe we can come to an agreement that respects both our interests. My counteroffer would be $7550 for the product. This price reflects the value of the item while allowing for some flexibility in our transaction.
I understand your perspective, Alice. After evaluating the situation further, I am willing to pay $7500 for the product.
